document_data.caption: A rod of surprises depicted on the far right among various other rods
document_data.name: Rod of surprises
document_data.mainbody: '''Rods of surprises''' were an enchanted variety of [[rod]]s that could carry messages and transform into a variety of different weapons.
document_data.Abilities:
A ''rod of surprises'' could be extended in length up to {{SI|60|ft|long=yes}} and was capable of supporting up to {{SI|800|lb|k}} without bending.

Beyond its transformative properties, a ''rod of surprises'' could store a message that was up to 25 words and later relay it in a manner similar to the ''[[magic mouth]]'' [[spell]] when a triggering condition set by the wielder was met.
document_data.Creation: Creating a ''rod of surprises'' required the use of the spells ''magic mouth'', ''[[levitate]]'', and ''[[warp wood]]''.
